name: Kingdom Cards (Pelf)
description:
My liege, you are the new king! Manage your kingdom and try to either unite or defeat the rival kingdoms to rule the Realm. Pick a card from one rival kingdom to act on, but choose wisely because the other cards will be ignored to your detriment.

Made for GMTK 2021 game jam (theme: Joined Together). Join with other kingdoms (or not!) to rule the realm.
